contest-event.event-date:
May 13, 1979 D Oxfordshire & District Brass Band Association Entertainment Contest (Section A)
Oxfordshire & District Brass Band Association Entertainment Contest (Section A) 20 Entertainments Contest Oxfordshire & District BBA Entertainment Contest oxfordshire-district-brass-band-section-a
Abbey Hall, Abingdon, Oxfordshire, England, UK The programme lists four adjudicators, two of which seem likely for music, two for presentation. They are, as listed in the programme, Capt. M. G. Lane, Ian Morrish, Simon Park and Major F. R. Sillitoe. If you know who adjudicated which section, please let us know.
Presentation: 1 Kennington 2 Yarnton 3 Brackley
March 28, 2013, 7:02 p.m. March 28, 2013, 7:04 p.m.
1 Kennington (Oxford) Ron Sudworth
2 Kidlington Silver George Tutte
3 Yarnton Band David Williams
Unknown Result City of Oxford Silver Band Don Keene
Unknown Result Brackley and District Band Les Taylor
